name: The promised land's quest
description:
The game

"Where in smallness you will find your happiness. The most daring, mischievous and deserving will find this so-called promised land in these autumn time in the Forest of Mealtime".  A legend that all Dupland foxes know. This is what especially pushed the young Foxtaumn to go on an adventure to stock up on provisions for the winter. What will he discover during this long quest? What does he risk knowing that the foxes that went on the quest never returned?

How to

Click left to drag and drop and to select

AWSD to move

Space to jump

Assets
https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest

Feel free to share your feedback
